io.micronaut.context.env

Interface PropertySourceLocator

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PropertySourceLoader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPropertySourceLoader, CloudFoundryVcapApplicationPropertySourceLoader, CloudFoundryVcapServicesPropertySourceLoader, EnvJsonPropertySourceLoader, JsonPropertySourceLoader, PropertiesPropertySourceLoader, YamlPropertySourceLoader

    public interface PropertySourceLocator
    An interface for beans that are capable of locating a PropertySource instance.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
